thread.title: BRIEF-Bank Of Communications To Set Up Branch In Melbourne, Unit To Boost Finance Leasing Firm's Capital

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bank Of Communications To Set Up Branch In Melbourne, Unit To Boost Finance Leasing Firm's Capital

organizations.name: boost finance leasing firm's capital feb
reuters) - bank of communications co ltd

text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Bank of Communications Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT PLANS TO SET UP BRANCH IN MELBOURNE, AUSTRALIA * SAYS UNIT PLANS TO BOOST CAPITAL OF FINANCE LEASING SUBSIDIARY BY 7.0 BILLION YUAN ($1.11 billion)TO 8.5 BILLION YUAN Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2GAEQmB ; bit.ly/2nrxQjX Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2930 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
